page.title: 05Education:A school Day.
page.content: Phillip's Mum wakes him at 7.15am. He lives outside the village so he has two buses to catch. David comes from Edenhall by car. We start school at 9.00 am. We have a wide range of lessons to do. In the morning we some- times do maths from our textbooks, other days we do topic maths which extends textbook work. After break we do language work which can include English exercises , essays or our own opinion work. Topic and project work includes history,science,geography,art and craft. We are just finishing a particularly interesting project about natural resources .We discussed wind, sun and water power.We made models using meccano, lego and old plastic bottles. Our project has taken us on to plastic and fibres. We can go to Penrith pool once a week and nearly every one can swim.
